sense.def:
Kdor ima na obrazu izraz, za katerega rečemo, da je
wry
, daje z njim vedeti, da je slab ali težaven položaj zanj nekoliko smešen ali ironičen.

seg.quote: He came out with a wry smile on his face.
She said this with a wry glance at me.
My friend smiled wryly when he saw me.

sense.def:
Pripomba ali besedilo, ki je
wry
, o slabem ali težavnem položaju govori šaljivo ali porogljivo.

seg.quote: On receipt of his insurance claim, there were some wry comments.
...his direct style of writing and wry humour.
